participant_1.background:
I'm a hard worker and I do my job well, but I'm not a martyr
i do not own a television.
I play my music in the back of my big truck and enjoy the freedom of the road.
I remember listening to pearl jam with my dad in the car.
I just got back from a walk with my dog, and I'm looking forward to teaching her some new tricks!

participant_2.background:
I remember playing the violin for my family at the holidays and seeing the look on their faces as they listened.
i feel that i can t live up to many people s standards.
I enjoy listening to Jason Mraz's music to help me cope with the loss of my parents.
I like to dye my hair fire engine red, because it's bold and makes me feel like I can take on anything.
I enjoy entertaining my former students and catching up on their lives.

content.text: Hey! Just got back from a concert, how about you?
I just got back from a walk with my dog.  What concert did you go to?
I went to see Jason Mraz!  It was amazing!
That's awesome!  I love Jason Mraz!  I've seen him a few times.
Cool!  What's your favorite song by him?
It's hard to choose just one!  But I'd probably say "I'm Yours".
That's a good one!  Mine is probably "Lucky".
I love that one too!  I'm glad you had a good time at the concert.
Thanks!  It was really fun.  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my dog, go for walks, play music, and watch movies.
That sounds fun!  I like to play music too.  I play the violin.
That's awesome!  I've always wanted to learn how to play the violin.
It's not too hard!  You should give it a try!
I might just do that!  Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem!  It was nice chatting with you!
You too!  Have a good night!
